name: KIPP: Untouched
summary:
Welcome back to the nightmare

​8 years after the original Karmen's Interactive Playplace location closed, Joseph Incwell has decided to reopen! You're the new guard tasked with making sure nobody (or nothing) gets into the new and improved restaurant, more importantly your office. Keep an eye on your cameras, making sure everything is right in the new Karmen's Interactive Playplace. Will you be able to last all five nights?
